item.title: Inverted Pendulum
item.description: Presentation Objective is to build an unstable pendulum platform to experiment various control loop to stabilize it. Top of the inverted pendulum click open full pendulum picture The DIY hardware is presented. An overview of the model is given and a LQR feedback control loop tested. -- Video of the stabilized platform with a 4 state LQR feedback loop.
